column1: The Massacre at Tarn Aeluin was an event during the First Age when Barahir the Bold and his ten outlaws were killed in their hideout by Tarn Aeluin
column3: Beren of the original band alive.  Though this was long sought for by Morgoth and his active servant Sauron
column4: it was not until Gorlim betrayed their hiding place that it occurred.  Beren
column5: upon returning to find his father and comrades dead
column6: built a cairn over their bodies and swore an oath of vengeance.
